page.title: 17CRIME AND POPULATION
page.content: outside the area.Neighbourhood watch schemes are being organised. {CRIME FIGURES FOR PENISTONE POLICE {AREA}_ (including Millhouse and Thurlstone). Jan _ June 1984 (1985 figs ln brackets), Burglaries 89 (76) Thefts from vehicles 50 (56), other theft 34 (78), Criminal Damage 27 (39) Assault 6 (15), Wounding 0 (2), Taking vehicles 5 (5). {POPULATION}_ Out of 67 children in Millhouse School, 40 were born in Millhouse and 27 elsewhere. Majority born in South Yorkshire, one family is from Bury in Lancashire, one from Kent and one from London. In the past year, only three families have left the area. The population is fairly static. {HOLIDAYS}_ Out of 74 people in Mill_ house 20 holidayed abroad last year and 54 in Britain. Scotland was the most popular in Britain Greece abroad.
